name: TheMuffinMan-InteractiveSong
0:
”Alexa, open The Muffin Man”
”Alexa, start The Muffin Man”
”Alexa, launch The Muffin Man”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the muffin man
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Muffin Man skill is an Interactive Song for Children of all ages! Children's singer Megan Schoenbohm sings one verse of the original Muffin Man song, and then four verses of a new version of it (written by Megan and Chatty Creations), the fun part is that you can choose who you're going to meet in the song!! For example, "Do you want to meet a Dog or a Cat?" then the song continues according to that choice! 

You can always ask for your favorite character out of the 9 characters, for example, say "Alexa a cat".

We hope you have lots of fun!

MusicTimeWithMegan.com
ChattyCreations.com

Be sure to leave a review! Please send us an email, if you have any comments or questions for us:
chattycreations@gmail.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
